beer.beer_description:
When our mates at Odd Culture made the journey back up the Mountains to brew our second collaboration beer we thought it was only fitting to brew a beer based on a Tiki Cocktail that means a lot to us both. The Painkiller cocktail is a mainstay of Odd Culture venues cocktail lists and for Mountain Culture, well let’s just say that Painkiller cocktails are the only reasons we made it about through the mornings during our recent trip to San Diego.

The Painkiller consists of Pusser’s Rum, pineapple and coconut with a touch of orange juice which we’ve recreated using a healthy dose of Sabro and El Dorado hops and creamy, lactose infused body (the rum is sold separately, sorry).

items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 100 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 21! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 425 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 86. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: I like big stouts and I cannot lie...
Duff Man is thrusting in the direction of the problem

user.bio: Untappd Moderator (M2) Melbourne, Australia. Lover of all things beer! Beer ratings and descriptions are my own.
Just a man and his liver enjoying good beer.

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 170 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 35!

user.bio: Drinky drinky, time for less thinky.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 320 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 65!

user.bio: Nose follows the hops around the world.
